# Challenge: TSE ORDERS
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/77364331/161676598-8eaab4f5-a03a-4691-8bc1-58451b62e338.png)

## Description
Building a simple webapp that at least brings all data from persistence layer as a table.

## How to run? 
1. Clone/download this project
2. In terminal enter the project directory and run:
`npm install`
3. Next in terminal, run the command:
`npm start`
4. Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) to view it in your browser.

## Deploy: 
[View the deploy](tse-orders.vercel.app)
